meanings.sent2: He always wears untucked shirts on casual Fridays.
meanings.sent3: The untucked shirt made her look like she just rolled out of bed.
meanings.sent4: The untucked blanket resembled a fluffy cloud on the bed.
meanings.sent5: The untucked shirt flapped in the wind as he ran.

meanings.definition: Not fastened or secured in place
meanings.sent1: The untucked belt kept slipping down.
meanings.sent2: The untucked shoelaces caused him to trip.
meanings.sent3: The untucked seatbelt kept clicking as the car moved.
meanings.sent4: Her untucked hair flew wildly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The untucked rope swung freely in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: The untucked papers were scattered all over the desk.
meanings.sent2: His untucked backpack spilled its contents on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The untucked books on the shelf looked like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her untucked hair resembled a wild forest.
meanings.sent5: The untucked clothes hung haphazardly in the closet.
